issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
navis has commented on the revision "HIVE-3909 [jira] Wrong data due to HIVE-2820".

  Removed all of the confusing order mapping from mapjoins.

REVISION DETAIL
  https://reviews.facebook.net/D8013

To: JIRA, navis

njain has accepted the revision "HIVE-3909 [jira] Wrong data due to HIVE-2820".

REVISION DETAIL
  https://reviews.facebook.net/D8013

BRANCH
  DPAL-1965

To: JIRA, njain, navis
